examples: Shearer finished among the top ten goal scorers in 10 out of his 14 seasons in the Premier League and won the top scorer title three times.

entries.meaning: One who keeps track of scores in a game; a scorekeeper.
examples: The team was making goals so fast the scorer could barely keep up.

entries.meaning: (cricket) Either of a pair of people, one provided by each side, who record in a specially formatted book, every ball bowled, every run scored, and every wicket that falls
